body: Hi Mostapha; As I did not know how to export a BSDF file in Optics, I export an .xml file in Window and assign it to Honeybee but it seems that does not work.  Best [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ZDUJ5UEpZjuFD4YsAunsAryo0tlyWm8s0ztBd4*9Fqm7M8G9XR7zVhaJaZJD8kTkXHEitok9lqTQpplAIvNz*xcXjYYML075/Untitled.png)
